title: Banana, carrot and courgette loaf
ingredients: ['80g butter, melted', '3 very ripe bananas, mashed', '70g grated carrot', '70g grated courgette', '110g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 pinch of salt', '50g chopped walnuts or pecans']
